verses.verse: (1 This Psalm containeth the commendation of brotherly amity among the servants of God. ) Behold, how good and how comely a thing it is, brethren to dwell even together.

It is like to the precious (The ointment was a figure of the graces which come from Christ the head upon his Church.) ointment upon the head, that runneth down upon the beard, even unto Aaronâ€™s beard, which went down on the border of his garments,

And as the dew of (By Hermon and Zion he meaneth the plentiful country about Jerusalem.) Hermon which falleth upon the mountains of Zion: for (Where there is such concord.) there the Lord appointed the blessing and life forever.
